Uses of Interface
org.tantalum.Workable

    Package Description
    org.tantalum

    • Uses of Workable in org.tantalum

      Classes in org.tantalum that implement Workable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncTask
      An implementation of Android's AsyncTask pattern for cross platform application on J2ME and Android.
      class  Task
      A Task is the base unit of work in the Tantalum toolset.
      class  UITask
      A unit of work which, once the Task.doInBackground() is completed on a background Worker thread, should update the user interface from the UI Thread in onPostExecute().
      Methods in org.tantalum with parameters of type Workable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Worker.fork(Workable workable)
      Add an object to be executed in the background on the worker thread.
      static void Worker.fork(Workable workable, int priority)
      Worker.HIGH_PRIORITY : Jump an object to the beginning of the forkSerial (LIFO - Last In First Out).
      static void Worker.forkSerial(Workable workable, int serialQIndex)
      Queue compute to the Worker specified by serialQIndex.
      static void Worker.forkShutdownTask(Workable workable)
      Add an object to be executed in the background on the worker thread
      static boolean Worker.tryUnfork(Workable workable)
      Take an object out of the pending task queue.

    • Uses of Workable in org.tantalum.net

      Classes in org.tantalum.net that implement Workable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpGetter
      GET something from a URL on the Worker thread Implement Runnable if you want to automatically update the UI on the EDT after the GET completes
      class  HttpPoster
      HTTP POST a message to a given URL
      class  StaticWebCache.GetAnywhereTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_ANYWHERE operation on a Worker thread in the background.
      class  StaticWebCache.GetWebTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_WEB operation on a Worker thread in the background.
